answers.answer: Take tynanol for your head for starters and then go to the doctor and have them do a test. No need to worry if you don't know :)
You need to pump fluids...powerade...water things like that...try Tylonel for your headaches and lay on your left side...also try eating ice cubes slowly .if that doesn't help go get checked.

Thanks bt I called my Dr office and they had the on call Dr call me back. And he said that even tho some of my symptoms are normal for pregnancy bt I do have a lot of symptoms dat do sound like signs of diabetes (some symptoms I did not name on here)so he's leaving a note so they can push my appointment date up so I can get tested

question: Ok so I'm 4 mths prego and lately I've been having very bad head aches and now I'm also starting to get severe dry mouth n pain n my legs.....and I talked to my aunt which is a nurse n she said it cud b signs of onset diabetes and that my lil cuzn was jus diagnosed with diabetes and she was having da same symptoms..... an I'm nervous bcuz as we kno diabetes is very common and easy to get wen ur prego. WHAT SHOULD I DO IM SCARED
title: I'M NERVOUS PLZ HELP
